messages.subject: Re: appreciating you
messages.msgSnippet: ~~ You are always so thoughtful with your responses and generous with your time considering and responding to everyone else s posts. I look forward to hearing
messages.messageBody:
~~ You are always so thoughtful with your responses and generous with your time considering and responding to everyone else's posts. I look forward to hearing your point of view on topics I am following, and will read your posts if I see your name on a thread I otherwise might pass by. I read your responses and think "we can do this."~~


I agree and this is a great time for me to go ahead and let you all know that Meredith is our new moderator.
I have long enjoyed her mindful, well-written responses and thought that she would be a great addition here, since our moderators (and our other owner) are mostly absent these days.:)

I need to cut back even further on my internet time too, so the list will be in good hands with Meredith looking out for it. I'm really grateful for her time and energy here. Thank you Meredith!!

Ren
radicalunschooling.blogspot.com

messages.subject: appreciating you
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Meredith, My name is Angela. I am mother to three -- 7YO ds, and 4YO and 20mo dds -- and we are in the process of figuring out what do for my son,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Meredith,

My name is Angela. I am mother to three -- 7YO ds, and 4YO and 20mo dds -- and we are in the process of figuring out what do for my son, specifically, and the whole family ultimately, so I've been lurking here for a few months.

You are always so thoughtful with your responses and generous with your time considering and responding to everyone else's posts. I look forward to hearing your point of view on topics I am following, and will read your posts if I see your name on a thread I otherwise might pass by. I read your responses and think "we can do this."

So, just thought I'd send out a thank you.
Best,
Angela Wolff
West Orange, NJ

http://campwolff.blogspot.com/
